publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1645 Cathie Craigie: Cumbernauld Theatre Silver Jubilee—That the Parliament congratulates Cumbernauld Theatre in its Silver Jubilee year; recognises the valuable contribution that the theatre makes to the local community; pays tribute to the board members, staff and performers past and present, and looks forward to the continued success of the theatre.
S2M-1645 Cumbernauld Theatre Silver Jubilee (lodged on 6 September 2004) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1645 Cumbernauld Theatre Silver Jubilee (lodged on 6 September 2004) Trish Godman*

S2M-1645 Cathie Craigie: Cumbernauld Theatre Silver Jubilee—That the Parliament congratulates Cumbernauld Theatre in its Silver Jubilee year; recognises the valuable contribution that the theatre makes to the local community; pays tribute to the board members, staff and performers past and present, and looks forward to the continued success of the theatre. Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Trish Godman
S2M-1645 Cumbernauld Theatre Silver Jubilee (lodged on 6 September 2004) Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-1645 Cumbernauld Theatre Silver Jubilee (lodged on 6 September 2004) Mr Brian Monteith*
S2M-1645 Cumbernauld Theatre Silver Jubilee (lodged on 6 September 2004) Linda Fabiani*

S2M-1645 Cumbernauld Theatre Silver Jubilee (lodged on 6 September 2004) Chris Ballance*, Michael McMahon*, Des McNulty*, Bristow Muldoon*, Carolyn Leckie*, Karen Whitefield*, Irene Oldfather*, Sarah Boyack*, Bill Butler*, Elaine Smith*, Pauline McNeill*
